Strategy implementations must:   1. Accept USDC deposits via deposit()   2. Return USDC on withdraw()/withdrawAll()   3. Report accurate totalValue() in USDC terms   4. Handle approve/transferFrom for deposits from Treasury","kind":"dev","methods":{"deposit(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount of USDC to deposit"},"returns":{"deposited":"Actual amount deposited (may differ due to slippage)"}},"totalValue()":{"returns":{"_0":"Total value in USDC (6 decimals)"}},"withdraw(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount of USDC to withdraw"},"returns":{"withdrawn":"Actual amount withdrawn"}},"withdrawAll()":{"returns":{"withdrawn":"Total amount withdrawn"}}},"title":"IStrategy","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"asset()":{"notice":"The underlying asset this strategy accepts (should be USDC)"},"deposit(uint256)":{"notice":"Deposit USDC into the strategy"},"isActive()":{"notice":"Whether the strategy is currently accepting deposits"},"totalValue()":{"notice":"Total value of assets held by this strategy (in USDC terms)"},"withdraw(uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw USDC from the strategy"},"withdrawAll()":{"notice":"Withdraw all USDC from the strategy"}},"notice":"Interface for yield strategies that TreasuryV2 deploys USDC into","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/interfaces/IStrategy.sol":"IStrategy"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/",":eth-gas-reporter/=node_modules/eth-gas-reporter/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/"]},"sources":{"contracts/interfaces/IStrategy.sol":{"keccak256":"0x857f9d6d0600c83d039dd42924733558a1037e60784fd4f28953277b49615100","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fd062149c05b1ab2d3d229805de4fd841a8789b1b81ed449a51135a13266eadf","dweb:/ipfs/QmTSzEP8dmnJ5qZUnFrUCwXddvguLWDzojNP7KFuQE6kTs"]}},"version":1}

returns.deposited: Actual amount deposited (may differ due to slippage)

asset().notice: The underlying asset this strategy accepts (should be USDC)

isActive().notice: Whether the strategy is currently accepting deposits

totalValue().notice: Total value of assets held by this strategy (in USDC terms)

withdrawAll().notice: Withdraw all USDC from the strategy
